Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45707 affecting package rpm-ostree for versions less than 2024.4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-45707 affecting package rpm-ostree for versions less than 2024.4-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package rpm-ostree is earlier than 2024.4-1, affected by CVE-2021-45707
